testcase.name: Add new coupon
testcase.system-out: Given user navigated to login page..........................................passed When user enters "admin" and "Admin@123"....................................passed Then user should see Dashboard..............................................passed Given user Hovers on share icon.............................................passed When user clicks on Coupons button..........................................passed And user should see Coupons page............................................passed And user Clicks on Add new coupon button....................................passed And user enters all details and clicks save button..........................passed Then user should see coupon name in coupons list............................passed And user should see modification success message............................passed
